description_top: Monumenti dell'Egitto e della Nubia: disegnati dalla spedizione scientifico-letteraria toscana in Egitto : distribuiti in ordine di materie
title: Monumenti dell'Egitto e della Nubia: disegnati dalla spedizione scientifico-letteraria toscana in Egitto : distribuiti in ordine di materie
author: Rosellini, Ippolito, 1800-1843
description: The Rosellini expedition is an invaluable and irreplaceable record because it contains information and illustrations of Egyptian monuments made early in the exploration and exploitation of that country. It is one of the oldest and most important publications to include accurate copies of reliefs and inscriptions and is still regularly consulted for many of them.
subject: Egypt--History, Ancient
